name: Respect the other players along with the admins & mods.
Help your teammates, especially the newer players! You were new once too.
Watch your fire! Accidents will happen. Apologize and move on.
No fighting, causing unnecessary drama, or insulting each other.Â It's only a game so relax!
Please do not spam; This includes the chat, voice chat, and in-game name changes.
No offensive player names or sprays!
No racism, homophobia, bigotry or xenophobia.
